page.title: 16THE AREA IN WHICH I LIVE.
page.content: The area where I live is very peaceful with not much traffic.There is always something for you to do.Where I live there are lots of different shops, a cafe,garage,butcher,laundrette,bakery, and a first school for pupils aged 4 to 8.St. Andrew's Middle is a short walk away.There are 2 or 3 parks near,including Whinfield Rec.,where I play on Sundays.Handy is the market, open on Mondays,Fridays,and Saturdays. Our house,a modernised old terraced house,not very big,is conveniently placed quite near to my mum's work at G.E.C.The railway is just up the road. Round the corner is the cattle market, where on occasions there is a circus or fair.I go to the Methodist Church, in Cambridge St.,10 mins. walk away, every Sunday ,unless I have a steel band practice or I'm ill.I go across town to the Sports Centre when free.
